item.title: Best Pet Supplies Foam Pet Steps for Small Dogs and Cats, Portable Ramp Stairs for Couch, Sofa, and High Bed Climbing, Non-Slip Balanced Indoor Step Support, Paw Safe
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Make it easier for your small-to-medium dogs and cats to climb onto furniture and then get back down all by themselves with foam pet stairs offering well-balanced stability. If you love your pets as much as we do you really enjoy when they come up into bed or onto the ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $89.99 - $75.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:35:49 UTC – Details)


Make it easier for your small-to-medium dogs and cats to climb onto furniture and then get back down all by themselves with foam pet stairs offering well-balanced stability. If you love your pets as much as we do you really enjoy when they come up into bed or onto the couch to give you a snuggle. But if your pet is too small or getting older they can’t always jump up and down to do it themselves. And if you’re not always around to help them or you’re getting a bit old yourself, sometimes you need a little extra help. We developed the Best Pet Supplies Foam Pet Stairs as a simple, effective way to get them up and down while putting less stress on you both. Featuring a non-slip bottom these fabric-covered stairs in 3-step, 4-step, and 5-step sizes simply push right up to the edge so they can climb up or get down quickly, easily, and safely. Product Details: Pet Stairs for Couch, Bed, and Sofa; Supports Small to Medium Dogs and Cats; Heavy-Duty CertiPUR-US Certified Foam; Well-Balanced, Reliable Support for Pets; Lightweight and Portable for Whole Home Use; Soft Fabric Exterior for Paw-Friendly Support; Available in Multiple Colors to Match Home Decor; Help your small dog or aging cat get up on the couch or bed more easily with a soft, supportive foam pet stair system from Best Pet Supplies designed specifically for your four-legged friends. Get one now by clicking Add to Cart above.
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 30 x 16 x 22.5 inches; 5.78 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ ST235C-L
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ October 12, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Best Pet Supplies, Inc.
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08L42MKC3
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ USA

CertiPUR-US Certified Foam: To ensure that your pet gets the safest quality steps, we made sure that our USA sourced foams are CertiPUR-US Certified. CertiPUR-US Certified foams are manufactured without ozone depleters, PDBW flame retardants, mercury, lead and other substances/chemicals that can be harmful to your pets.
Reduces Strain on Older Adults – Our versatile dog steps not only help your pets they minimize the need for you to have to pick up your animal to get them up on the furniture, which is especially important if you struggle with strength or stability
Multiple Step Size Options – Ideal for small to medium sized pets these steps for dogs and cats come in 3-step, 4-step, and 5-step options, so you can use them as dog stairs for beds or pet stairs for cats who need help climbing on a sofa
Trendy Home Decor Colors – We want our dog stairs for high beds and couches to better match your living room, bedroom, or personal space which is why they’re available in 17 different colors and patterns to fit your individual style

Read more

Stability For All Ages

With an anti-slip bottom and 15 or 16 inch width, your dog or cat will climb effortlessly to their favorite spots.

CertiPUR-US Certified Foam*

Crafted from CertiPUR-US certified foams, these pet stairs are made without ozone depleters, PDBW flame retardants, mercury, lead and other substances/chemicals that can be harmful to your pets.

Certificate Issued: September 25, 2018 Alliance for Flexible Polyurethane Foam/CertiPUR-US program.

Cushion Every Step

The mattress-grade foam inside cushions and supports your pet’s every step reducing stress and relieving pressure on their paws and joints.

Easy to Keep Clean

All sizes of steps come with a completely removable cover that is machine washable. All our fabrics are pleasing to the touch and the eyes. With different options to choose from, it will be easy to maintain your household’s good vibes.

Read more

Sizes Available:

– Small: 15″W x 13.5″H x 18″L.

– Medium: 15″W x 18″H x 24″L.

– Large: 16″W x 22.5″H x 30″L.

Different Heights For Different Spaces

Does your dog need just a little help getting on the couch? Is your cat finding it difficult to reach his favorite window? Give them ultimate access with our 3 ranges of height.

The large is 22 1/2″ inches in height, giving your pet access to taller places within your home. The medium reaches 18″ in height, allowing for a simple climb to reach a snuggle session. The small steps are 13 1/2″ tall, for a simple boost up to a favorite window sill.

  • Our steps are easy to move around your home or take on the go for some adventures. Never worry about your pet’s accessibility anymore, with Pet Supplies Foam Pet Stairs!

Read more





Dark Grey with White Lattice Print
Brown Linen
Grey Corduroy
Grey Linen
Dark Brown Suede
Paws-Black Fleece
3 Step 15″W x 13.5″H x 18″L 15″W x 13.5″H x 18″L 15″W x 13.5″H x 18″L 15″W x 13.5″H x 18″L 15″W x 13.5″H x 18″L 15″W x 13.5″H x 18″L
4 Step 15″W x 18″H x 24″L 15″W x 18″H x 24″L 15″W x 18″H x 24″L 15″W x 18″H x 24″L 15″W x 18″H x 24″L 15″W x 18″H x 24″L
5 Step 16″W x 22.5″H x 30″L 16″W x 22.5″H x 30″L 16″W x 22.5″H x 30″L 16″W x 22.5″H x 30″L 16″W x 22.5″H x 30″L 16″W x 22.5″H x 30″L

4.5

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);
var offlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineInput’);
var onlineUrl = document.querySelector(‘#onlineUrl’);
var onlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlinePriceRaw’);
var onlineShippingRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlineShippingRaw’);
var onlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#onlineDay’);
var onlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#onlineMonth’);
var onlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#onlineYear’);
var onlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#onlineCalendar’);

var offlineStoreName = document.querySelector(‘#offlineStoreName’);
var offlineCity = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCity’);
var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,
enableOfflineStoreRadio,
enableOnlineStoreRadio,
onlineCalendar,
offlineCalendar
);
}

});

Price: $38.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:39:25 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Packing list:

1* Kids Phone

1* 8G SD Card

1*Lanyard

1*User Manual

Advantage :
1. 180° flip camera
2. Easy to use and carry
3. With 11 funny frames
4. Come with 8GB SD card

Prysyedawn Kids Phone

In order to stimulate children’s desire for exploration and interest in photography, we upgraded the Prysyedawn phone with a new high-definition 180° flip camera configuration. Combining kids phone & MP3 music player to design a role-playing cell phone for toddlers. Small size, easy to carry. suitable for outdoor travel use, allow kids to explore their creativity and curiosity. Your child will have their first own fake phone, you will never have to worry about your child using your smartphone.

Specifications :
Display Screen: 2 inch
Battery Capacity: 600mAh
Charging Time: 2-3 Hours
Charging Cable: USB Type-C cable
Support 3.5mm Headphone Jack
System Languages: 20 languages are supported. e.g. English, Spanish, French, Italian, Russian, German, Portuguese, etc.

Cute Stickers and Frames

This toddler phone can be flipped 180° to take cute photos. The sticker camera with 11 cute stickers can choose. Let your little girls get creative by taking photos and the lifetime more interesting.

Wallpapers & Desktop

10 wallpapers, 5 styles of desktop to choose from. Let your child experience the joy of different wallpapers.

Alarm Clock

This phone can teach kids to follow a schedule and develop autonomy by setting alarms to do homework, brush teeth, or go to bed. (only set 4 alarms)

Flashlight

Let the child from being scared when they are in the dark. (Be careful when using the flashlight, Don’t point the light directly at people or animals, as it may cause eye damage.)

4 Funny Puzzle Games

4 Interesting learning games that can develop children’s intelligence and exercise their ability to react and think.

Perfect Gift for Kids Ages 3-6

Kids like taking selfies, videos, large Storage to meet the needs of kids. This Phone toy can store thousands of photos, and kids can recall everything he has recorded! At the same time, you can download music that your child likes to listen to, which helps to develop language and reasoning skills, as well as enhance your child’s memory and creativity. The perfect gift for boys and girls ages 3 4 5 6.

Notice:

1. Do not disassemble the battery.

2. Use the USB cable to connect to the computer. The phone will display charging and the computer will read the disk. You can download photos or music.

3. For adding new music, please confirm the downloaded music is in MP3 format.

4. Our fake phone has no call capabilities, so you don’t need to buy a SIM card for this.

【Upgraded Toddler Cell Phone】Combining kids phone & MP3 music player to design a role-playing cell phone for toddlers. Equipped with auto Focus, 8.0 Mega pixels and 1080P Video. Greatly improved the definition of photos. With Big head sticker shooting, children can take photos with frames, leave some hilarious photos with family or friends. And it has a high-quality speaker that can support a 3.5mm headphone jack. It is good for children to learn and listen to music.
【180° Flip Camera】Upgraded to flip-camera configuration, Easy to take selfies. Just open the switch key to enjoy the fun of taking photos. With 10 wallpapers and 5 desktops, kids can switch between their favorite wallpapers. Kids music player Includes a portable lanyard hang, easy to carry and move. Includes a video recorder, Alarm clock, game, and voice recorder for more creative ways to play.
【Powerful Battery Life】Continuously taking photos or listening to music for 1-2 hours after fully charged! Come with 1*USB Type-C cable & 1*8GB micro SD card to store thousands of photos!
【Safe & Durable Shockproof】This toddler music player is used high quality non-toxic soft plastic, more safe and comfortable for children’s skin. The shockproof shell provides effective anti-fall protection.
【Great Gift for Kids】Perfect birthday, Christmas, festival, and holiday gifts for boys and girls aged 3~6. Children love taking photo with extremely cute cell phone. Simply capture scene or animals on nature with family, experience the fun from nature. In addition, your child will have their first own fake phone, and you will never have to worry about your child using your smartphone again.






Packing list:

1* Kids Phone

1* 8G SD Card

1*Lanyard

1*User Manual

  • Advantage :
  • 1. 180° flip camera
  • 2. Easy to use and carry
  • 3. With 11 funny frames
  • 4. Come with 8GB SD card

item.title: GENIANI Portable Small Cool Mist Humidifiers 250ML – USB Desktop Humidifier for Plants, Office, Car, Baby Room with Auto Shut Off & Night Light – Quiet Mini Humidifier (White)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Brand GENIANI Special Feature Manual Color White Capacity 250 Milliliters Floor Area 65 Square Feet Operation Mode Ultrasonic Runtime 8 hours Item Weight 0.55 Pounds Room Type Bedroom Model Name Erie Material Plastic Product Dimensions 3.4″D x 3.4″W x 6″H Included Components Auto Shut Off, Night Light Voltage 5 Volts Wattage 2 watts Power Source ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Brand GENIANI
Special Feature Manual
Color White
Capacity 250 Milliliters
Floor Area 65 Square Feet
Operation Mode Ultrasonic
Runtime 8 hours
Item Weight 0.55 Pounds
Room Type Bedroom
Model Name Erie
Material Plastic
Product Dimensions 3.4″D x 3.4″W x 6″H
Included Components Auto Shut Off, Night Light
Voltage 5 Volts
Wattage 2 watts
Power Source USB Powered
Control Method Touch
Shape Oval
Product Dimensions 3.4 x 3.4 x 6 inches
Item Weight 8.8 ounces
ASIN B08JM6LTG5
Country of Origin China
Item model number Erie
Customer Reviews

4.4 out of 5 stars

34,057 ratings

4.4 out of 5 stars

Best Sellers Rank #171 in Home & Kitchen (See Top 100 in Home & Kitchen)
#5 in Humidifiers
Date First Available September 21, 2020

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $27.97
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:16:33 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Humidifiers 250ML & 2L

Humidifiers 4L & 6L

Tank Cleaners & Heating Pads

Heating Pads & Massagers

Heating Wrap & Spin Scrubbers

THE PERFECT BALANCE BETWEEN POWER AND PORTABILITY: The lightweight compact, slim design makes it the perfect choice for any environment. A great humidifier for bedroom, office, baby room, or car, just turn it on, and enjoy better, healthier air
BOOST COMFORT LEVELS INSTANTLY: The ultrasonic cool mist humidifier comes with two mist modes – continuous & intermittent – able to change the environmental humidity in minutes. An intuitive one-button control, without needless and complicated settings, and an auto shut-off feature for your safety and calmness
INSTANT DRYNESS FIXER: YOUR LUNGS WILL THANK YOU! Our brand new humidifier for bedroom or office incorporates an elegant, compact design, making it super-portable and easy to use. Erie desk humidifier will fine-tune the humidity levels of your surroundings, allowing you to breathe a healthier air, and make your environment a lot more pleasant
SLEEP TIGHT: While you are sound asleep, our humidifiers for bedrooms moisturize the room at the 38dB noise level. The unit is as quiet as a ticking clock
SILENT STEALTHY FUNCTION FOR DREAMY NIGHTS: Great for sleeping, it also doubles as a night-light! Soft on your eyes, this nifty little feature makes it the ideal humidifier to use at night or as a baby humidifier for nursery, offering a relaxed, quiet environment for a sound and healthy sleep.
1-YEAR WARRANTY: RISK-FREE PURCHASE & HASSLE-FREE REPLACEMENT. Please don’t hesitate to reach out. We would be more than willing to assist! Just a little tip: to increase the life of the humidifier, we recommend using GENIANI Cotton Sticks.

Geniani Erie Humidifier

Introducing the newest innovation of air humidifiers for home or office!

The Erie Humidifier is a compact, yet powerful instant dryness fixer. Now you can have the capabilities of a room humidifier in a fabulous portable version. The mini humidifier also helps with the relief of allergy symptoms and dry cough.

Key features:

  • Sleek design & smart features
  • Portable, yet powerful
  • Offers up to 8 hours runtime
  • Silent action & night-light feature
  • Cost-effective compared to larger versions

Maintenance couldn’t be simpler!

Just a little effort to refill

The Erie personal humidifier can be refilled in seconds. Gently, with a single movement, unscrew the humidifier clockwise to fill it with water.

All-day or All-night Performance

You won’t have to worry about frequent refills since its 0.06 gal (250 ml) capacity is enough to last an entire office day, or night’s sleep.

Convenience at its best

This silent humidifier is such a great addition to an office, quietly working its magic for better air. It’s powered by most USB ports or sockets. Please note. The humidifier is not equipped with a battery; it is powered by a USB cord only.

One-button Control

Simple and intuitive one-button control to switch between operating modes. No hassle, just simple for optimal convenience.

Read more

Dry air is a definite plant killer. Just like your lungs need fresher air, so do most plants need a certain level of humidity to thrive. This small humidifier for plants will keep the air at optimum humidity level, so your lovely plants will have all the moisture they need to flourish.

At home – Perfect. At the office – Perfect. In the car – Perfect

Moisturize your skin

Moisturizing helps your skin stay young and reduces the chances of skin problems.

Safe for babies

With auto-shut off and a unique nightlight function, our humidifier is a nursery room must have! Ensure your children are receiving quality air throughout the night.

Quiet like breath

Ultra-quiet <30dB operating mode to deliver utterly silent operation.

Fits on cup holder

Designed in a sleek round style which allows it to fit in small spaces such as vehicle cup holders.

Read more

Erie Black

  • Offers up to 8 hours runtime
  • Silent action & night-light feature
  • Cost-effective compared to larger versions

Maintenance couldn’t be simpler!

Just a little effort to refill

The Erie personal humidifier can be refilled in seconds. Gently, with a single movement, unscrew the humidifier clockwise to fill it with water.

All-day or All-night Performance

You won’t have to worry about frequent refills since its 0.06 gal (250 ml) capacity is enough to last an entire office day, or night’s sleep.

Convenience at its best

This silent humidifier is such a great addition to an office, quietly working its magic for better air. It’s powered by most USB ports or sockets. Please note. The humidifier is not equipped with a battery; it is powered by a USB cord only.

One-button Control

Simple and intuitive one-button control to switch between operating modes. No hassle, just simple for optimal convenience.

Read more

Dry air is a definite plant killer. Just like your lungs need fresher air, so do most plants need a certain level of humidity to thrive. This small humidifier for plants will keep the air at optimum humidity level, so your lovely plants will have all the moisture they need to flourish.

At home – Perfect. At the office – Perfect. In the car – Perfect

Moisturize your skin

Moisturizing helps your skin stay young and reduces the chances of skin problems.

Safe for babies

With auto-shut off and a unique nightlight function, our humidifier is a nursery room must have! Ensure your children are receiving quality air throughout the night.

Quiet like breath

Ultra-quiet <30dB operating mode to deliver utterly silent operation.

Fits on cup holder

Designed in a sleek round style which allows it to fit in small spaces such as vehicle cup holders.

Read more

Learn More
Learn More
Learn More
Learn More


Feeling down with poor air quality?

Previous page

  1. Does your air feel stuffy?

    Small rooms can have poor air circulation, making them feel stuffy—especially when outdoor pollution is bad.

  2. Struggling to sleep?

    It’s hard to sleep soundly when airborne pollutants, such as dust and pollen, cause headaches, congestion, and coughing.

  3. Finding it hard to concentrate?

    Smoky smells, pollen from desk flowers, and airborne dust can make it difficult to focus at work.

  4. Noticing pet dander and smell?

    We love our pets, but these cute furry friends can come with pet dander and odors that lower our air quality.

Next page

Want to combat these issues but running into problems like these…

Poor Performance

Some air purifiers can run all night, but still do little to improve our air quality.

Loud & Noisy

Many conventional air purifiers operate with high noise levels, making it hard to fall asleep.

Too Big & Bulky

Lots of air purifiers are so big, it’s hard to find space for them in small rooms.

No Fragrance

Many air purifiers don’t offer the ability to add essential oils.

Finally, Meet the Levoit Core Mini Air Purifier

Previous page
Next page

The results? It has seriously made a world of difference!

No space is too small for this compact air purifier

Put it on your nightstand

Noticed a difference in sleep quality

Use it at the office

Put all your energy into your work

Place it on your dresser

Reduced the amount of dust on your dresser

Refresh your living room

It circulates the air well and makes it feel fresh.

“Mini” but Great

  1. We can’t always do great things, but we can do ‘mini’ things with great love.

    Whether you’re putting together your nursery, upgrading your workspace, or adding aromatherapy to your room—discover the “Great” difference one “Mini” air purifier can make.

  2. Every Mini Detail

    Every aspect of the Levoit Core Mini Air Purifier is designed with thoughtful innovation, so you can create a healthy space that’s just right for you.

4.5

(as of Nov 30,2022 06:15:19 UTC – Details)

item.title: Dexas MudBuster Portable Dog Paw Washer/ Paw Cleaner
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) The Dexas MudBuster is a new, innovative and easy way to rinse your dog’s dirty or muddy paws, before they track it all over the house! Using the MudBuster is easy: muddy paws go in, clean paws come out! To use, add a little water to the base of the ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $23.99 - $16.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:19:18 UTC – Details)


The Dexas MudBuster is a new, innovative and easy way to rinse your dog’s dirty or muddy paws, before they track it all over the house! Using the MudBuster is easy: muddy paws go in, clean paws come out! To use, add a little water to the base of the Mud Buster. Then, insert the muddy paw, do the twist, dab the paw dry, and repeat for 3 more feet! The Mud Buster features an array of soft, gentle, thick silicone bristles inside an easy-to-grip tumbler. Designed to be gentle on your dog’s paw, the silicone bristles will gently loosen mud and dirt, keeping the mess in the MudBuster and not in your home or car. The Mud Buster is great for trips to the park, hiking, running or even playing outside. The Medium MudBuster is specially sized for medium to large sized breeds. BPA free! In addition to grooming tools, Dexas carries a large assortment of Petware including the popular Popware for Pets collection. The MudBuster is a patented product: Patent No. D799,126, US and Foreign Patents Pending. Breeds include Australian Shepherd, Beagle, Border Collie, Boxer, Corgi, English Bulldog and many Terriers. “For dogs with environmental contact allergies. Rinsing their feet before they come inside helps to remove the irritants from their feet and reduces the amount of allergens that make it into your home.
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 4 x 4 x 6 inches; 5.76 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ PW710312
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ November 16, 2016
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Dexas International, LTD
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B01N64DCPR
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

To use, add a little water, insert the muddy paw, do the twist, dab the paw dry, repeat for 3 more paws
The gentle silicone bristles will help remove dirt and mud from your dog’s paws- keeping the mess in the MudBuster and not in your house
Keep the MudBuster handy after trips to the park, after walks or hikes, or by your backdoor
Simple and easy to use, just rinse and keep on hand for next muddy encounter. BPA free
Patent No. D799,126, US and Foreign Patents Pending


Read more

The MudBuster is an Easy Solution to Keep Fido’s Paws Clean




Easy to use

To use, add a little water, insert the muddy paw, do the twist, dab the paw dry, repeat for 3 more paws. To clean the MudBuster, remove the lid and bristles (bristles unroll for easy cleaning) and rinse for next use.

Gentle Silicone Bristles

The gentle silicone bristles on the MudBuster help loosen dirt and mud from your dog’s paws. Keep them mess outside- not in your car or home! The MudBuster is BPA free.

Ideal for Active Dogs or Rainy Days

Keep the MudBuster on hand for hiking, walks, or a trip to the park. Or, keep your MudBuster by your backdoor to get your dog’s paws clean before coming back into the house.

Read more


Find the Mudbuster That is Perfect for Your Pup

The MudBuster is made in three sizes, for comfort and convenience for a variety of dogs!

  • The Large MudBuster is perfectly sized for large and extra-large sized dogs: it measures 8.85 inches tall and 4.75 inches wide.
  • The Medium MudBuster is perfectly sized for medium sized dogs: it measures 6 inches tall and 4 inches wide.
  • The Small/Petite MudBuster is perfectly sized for smaller dogs: it measures 4.3 inches tall and 3.65 inches wide.

Read more


Dexas: Innovative Solutions since 1969

The MudBuster is proudly made by Dexas. Dexas is proud to offer a large assortment of Petware products including the MudBuster Paw Cleaner, Off-Leash Pet Toys, and a wide assortment of collapsible feeding bowl, pet food scoops and more.

Founded in Texas in 1969, Dexas has designed and produced top Homeware, Pet and Office items for over 50 years.

Read more

4.5

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:19:18 UTC – Details)

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $35.99 - $31.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:09:30 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Givebest has always been keeping itself on edge in same category of household appliance, and committing its users to bring home the best service and products, especially the heaters which sharing us the warmth and hope.

Winning the popular reputation from 600,000+ families worldwide, we will strive to keep polishing our brand and providing affordable and quality products to appreciate our loyal users.

GiveBest Tower Heater

GiveBest Portable Heater

GiveBest Electric Fireplace

2 in 1 heater fan: This ceramic heater provides two heat levels, 1500W or 750W and one cool air fan, you can use it both for winter and summer. Thermostat control of the heater will turn the heater off when it reaches a preset temperature and turn the heater back on when the temperature dips below the thermostat setting
Multi protection safety system: These heaters are made of flame retardant material avoiding any fire hazard. Automatic safety shutoff system will shut the heater off when the heater overheat. The tip over protection system will also shut the heater off when the heater was knocked over by accident and it will come back on automatically if it is up righted
Compact and powerful: 7.9 inch x 6.2 inch x 10.2 inch, 2.9 pounds portable mini heater with build in carry handle helps to reinforce the potential of rather low electrical bills by using at the place where you need when you don’t want to warm the full house with other centralized heaters
Quiet and fast heating: The noise this ceramic heater makes is lower than 45 decibels, quiet enough for most people to use in a bedroom while sleeping. With PTC ceramic heating tech and high speed fan, this heater put out tons of heat to heat up 200 square feet in seconds
Upgrade abs material: Upgrade abs material applied, which is more flame-retardant. The room heater with six feet lead cord and 2 prong connection has a long lasting life

Previous page
Next page

1 Quick Heat 2 Low Noise 3 Safe to Use

Is it a noisy heater?

Everyone's sensitivity to sound is different. The noise level of our heater is 45 dB . A suitable living environment should not exceed 55 dB and should not fall below 15 dB:)

Can I use the heater in the bathroom?

You can use the heater to heat your bathroom, but a heater is an electric appliance, it need to be kept away from water.

Does this heater is efficient and cost-effective?

Yes, this heater is a 1500w heater, so it is very efficient, the heating effect is the same as other heaters, but compared with other heaters, this heater is more cost-effective.

How do I choose a heater? From outlook or safe features or others ?

Absolutely safety first. A heater must have overheat and tip over protection.

I need a heater for my pet. Does this heater release chemicals such as PTFE?

No, our heaters don't release chemicals, it is safe for pets.

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:09:02 UTC – Details)


The Pale Rose Gold HP 14 Laptop is designed to keep you productive and entertained from anywhere. Maximize your viewing area and see every detail thanks to 6.5 mm micro-edge bezel display, 79% screen-to-body ratio, and 14-inch HD (1366 x 768) display (1) (2). Performance, power consumption, and value come together in the Intel® Celeron® N4020, the ideal processor for your busiest days (3). Enjoy the highest resolution games and movies with the 4K-ready Intel® UHD Graphics 600 (4) (5). Store more of what you love and multitask faster, even with multiple windows open, with this HP laptop’s 64 GB of eMMC storage and 4 GB of RAM (6). Up your creativity and efficiency as this HP 14-inch laptop offers even more features for computing from anywhere. Spend more time focused on your daily tasks and less on the battery life with up to 11 hours and 30 minutes of power (7). Plus, HP Fast Charge keeps you powered especially if you need recharge quickly (8). The exceedingly secure Windows 10 Home in S mode outfits your PC laptop with fast boot times, increased responsiveness, and added protection against phishing and malware (9). Work confidently with 1-year limited hardware warranty and stay connected with the dependable Wi-Fi 5 (1×1) and Bluetooth® 4.2 combo (10) (11). Boost your creativity as your Windows laptop comes with a 1-year subscription to Microsoft 365, including the whole Office Suite: Word, Excel, and PowerPoint (12). Productivity and entertainment features aren’t the only things your device is equipped with; lead a sustainable lifestyle with a thin laptop that is ENERGY STAR® certified and EPEAT® Silver registered (13) (14). (1) Percent of the active plus inactive viewing area to active viewing area plus border. Measure with lid vertical to the desk. (2) High-definition (HD) content is required to view high-definition images. (3) Multi-core is designed to improve the performance of certain software products. Not all customers or software applications will necessarily benefit from the use of this technology. Performance and clock frequency will vary depending on application workload and your hardware and software configurations. Intel’s numbering, branding, and/or naming is not a measurement of higher performance. Intel, Pentium, Intel Core, Celeron, Iris Xe, Intel logo, and the Intel Inside logo are trademarks of Intel Corporation in the U.S. and other countries. (4) Wireless access point and internet service required and sold separately. The availability of public wireless access points is limited. (5) Graphics output may be limited based on the maximum resolution of the display. Shared video memory (UMA) uses part of the total system memory for video performance. System memory dedicated to video performance is not available for other use by other programs. (6) For storage drives, GB = 1 billion bytes. The actual formatted capacity is less. Up to 5.1GB of disk is reserved for system recovery software. (7) Battery life tested by HP using continuous FHD video playback, 1080p (1920×1080) resolution, 150 nits brightness, system audio level at 17%, player audio level at 100%, played full-screen from local storage, headphone attached, wireless on but not connected. Actual battery life will vary depending on configuration and maximum capacity will naturally decrease with time and usage. (8) Features may require software or other 3rd party applications to provide the described functionality. Internet service required and not included. (9) Not all features are available in all editions or versions of Windows. Systems may require upgraded and/or separately purchased hardware, drivers, software, or BIOS update to take full advantage of Windows functionality. Windows 10 is automatically updated, which is always enabled. ISP fees may apply and additional requirements may apply over time for updates. See microsoft.com. Windows 10 Home (S mode) works exclusively with apps from the Microsoft Store within Windows. Certain default settings, features, and apps cannot be changed. Some accessories and apps compatible with Windows 10 may not work (including some antivirus, PDF Writers, driver utilities, and accessibility apps) and performance may vary, even if you switch to Windows 10 Home configuration (fee may apply). You can’t switch back to Windows 10 Home (S mode). Learn more at Windows.com/Windows10SFAQ. (10) Wireless access point and internet service required and sold separately. The availability of public wireless access points is limited. Wi-Fi 5 (802.11ac) is backward compatible with prior Wi-Fi 5 specs. (11) Bluetooth® is a trademark owned by its proprietor and used by Hewlett-Packard Company under license. (12) Microsoft 365 Personal 1-year subscription included. Activation is required within 6-months of the Windows activation date. Microsoft 365 Family and Microsoft 365 Personal have non-commercial rights and are meant for personal use only. See microsoft.com for full details. (13) ENERGY STAR and the ENERGY STAR mark are registered trademarks owned by the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency. (14) Based on U.S. EPEAT® registration according to IEEE 1680.1-2018 EPEAT®. EPEAT® status varies by country. Visit www.epeat.net for more information
READY FOR ANYWHERE – With its thin and light design, 6.5 mm micro-edge bezel display, and 79% screen-to-body ratio, you’ll take this PC anywhere while you see and do more of what you love (1)
MORE SCREEN, MORE FUN – With virtually no bezel encircling the screen, you’ll enjoy every bit of detail on this 14-inch HD (1366 x 768) display (2)
ALL-DAY PERFORMANCE – Tackle your busiest days with the dual-core, Intel Celeron N4020—the perfect processor for performance, power consumption, and value (3)
4K READY – Smoothly stream 4K content and play your favorite next-gen games with Intel UHD Graphics 600 (4) (5)
STORAGE AND MEMORY – An embedded multimedia card provides reliable flash-based, 64 GB of storage while 4 GB of RAM expands your bandwidth and boosts your performance (6)
POWERED UP AND PRODUCTIVE – Work, watch, and stay connected all day with up to 11 hours and 30 minutes of battery life (7); plus, HP Fast Charge technology charges your laptop computer from 0 to 50% in approximately 45 minutes so you never miss a beat (8)
WINDOWS 10 HOME AND WARRANTY – Experience the most secure Windows ever built with fast boot times, increased responsiveness, and added protection against phishing and malware (9). Start computing with confidence as your Windows 10 laptop is covered by a 1-year limited hardware warranty

Price: $84.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:05:44 UTC – Details)

Product Description

CORDLESS & EASY-TO-STORE:  No external power supply is needed, VacLife portable air compressor with a rechargeable battery pack can help you inflate most inflatables anytime and anywhere. With its lightweight and compact size of 6.3*2.5*2.4inch, you can simply store this cordless air compressor in your backpack, pocket, and car center console and take it out for use anytime. Help yourself from now on, saving the trouble of going to the gas station to inflate your tires.
FAST INFLATING & NON-STOP WORKING: VacLife mini air compressor is perfect for daily needs or emergencies. This powerful tire pump is embedded with a high-efficiency motor providing an airflow of 30L/Min. It only takes 30s to inflate a mountain bike(0-36psi) and 1min to inflate a 205/55 R16 car tire (29-36psi). Moreover, with the turbofan providing good heat dissipation, this tire pump can work continuously without pause. Also, the upgraded air hose is more heat-resistant and easy to handle.
LARGE-CAPACITY & LONG-LASTING: VacLife cordless tire inflator is powered by three large-capacity batteries of 2,500mAh that can work continuously for up to 25mins. Once fully charged in 3-4 hours, this portable tire pump can inflate 6 car tires (205/55/R16) from 29 to 36psi. In addition, with multiple accessories, it is suitable for different inflatables, such as the tire of cars, motorcycles, bicycles, and balls. It is a great helper for you on the road.
4+N SMART MODES: VacLife portable air pump for car tires is convenient to use with 4+N smart modes, easily meeting your various inflating needs! (Please note that it is suitable for car tires with width ≤ 245mm and pressure ≤ 50psi.) The 4 preset modes are car mode, motorcycle mode, bike mode, and ball mode, which facilitate the operation of the new beginners. Moreover, the manual mode enables you to set the desired pressure from 2-160psi according to different inflatables.
LED DIGITAL DISPLAY & AUTO SHUTOFF: This tire inflator with portable design comes with a precise pressure gauge and a large LED digital display, enabling you to read the real-time pressure and the preset pressure at just a glance. You can also rest assured with the auto shutoff design. This car air pump will stop automatically once reached the preset pressure. No more over-inflating, it’s simple and safe.
